titles.title: A resolution commending the bravery of the girls who attend the Mirwais School for Girls in Kandahar, Afghanistan.
A resolution commending the bravery of the girls who attend the Mirwais School for Girls in Kandahar, Afghanistan.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary:
Recognizes the extraordinary bravery shown by the girls and families of the Mirwais School for Girls in Kandahar, Afghanistan, especially the girls injured in the November 2008 attack, in the decision to return to school in the face of threats of violence.
Supports efforts to decrease illiteracy and gender-based violence in Afghanistan.
